epoch Synopsis 500.0: The one where EPOCHS END celebrated 500 Epochs on Cardano!
Totaling 2,500 days, or 6.84 years, this important
milestone reflects both the longevity and robustness
of Cardano as a network and ecosystem.
To commemorate the occasion, EPOCHS END released
a commemorative edition mint on DRIP DROPZ to
share this historical moment with the community,
which is an online tools for viewing the
contents of Epochs End NFTs thanks to the
amazing work from our buddy Mad Okrestra.
Cheers to 500 more from your friends

of the development of the Cardano ecosystem, and the
future of Cardano governance in particular.
This Epoch saw members of IOG visiting the country
to attend the ALBA graduation ceremony showcasing a
Cardano-focused graduation thesis, as well as Cardano
founder Charles Hoskinson meeting with local
organizations and officials in the lead up to
In addition, there was the ADN event, which was a
celebration and exploration of Argentina's entrepreneurial,
leadership and political DNA that was attended by over 40
Cardano community members and builders, and which was
sponsored by Input Output Global and Intersect,
with significant presence and participation of

epoch Synopsis 500.2: The one where the SEC retracted its request for a
court ruling to classify tokens such as Cardano,
Solana, Polygon and others as securities.
On July 30, the SEC wrote that it seeks to amend its
complaint regarding the 'Third Party Crypto Asset Securities'
defined in its opposition to Binance. This filing removes the
need to 'issue a ruling as to the sufficiency of the
allegations as to those tokens at this time.'
As a result, the government agency is no longer asking
a court to decide whether the affected tokens are
unregistered securities. This change-of-heart comes after
a June 2023 claim at least 68 tokens were securities,
which led to the delisting of ADA on many large platforms
such as Robinhood, among others, and successfully

Epoch Synopsis 500.3: The one where IOG released their PARTNER CHAIN toolkit
for Cardano, which enables blockchain builders to
As some chains lack a sufficient number of validators,
rendering the network vulnerable to low-cost attacks,
the partner-chains release allows developers of a
new blockchain network to bootstrap its security
by leveraging Cardano’s extensive network of
stake pool operators (SPOs). Many speculated how
and why SPOs would lend their infrastructure to
nacent blockchains as they emerge, but were informed
that Midnight will be the first partner chain
for Cardano SPOs to act as bootstrapping

Epoch Synopsis 500.5: The one where REALM OF TITANS released their official token
sale for Galaxy Dust. Realm Of Titans is a browser-based
fusion of massive multiplayer online games (MMO),
multiplayer online battle arenas (MOBA) and Web 3.
The Realm Of Titans Game employs a single currency,
Galaxy Dust ($GXD), which is used for all in-game assets
across the Realm Of Titans universe and pays for
various game features, including the Forge, Arena,

Epoch Synopsis 500.6: The one where NUCAST announced the winners of the first-
ever Music Video Fest on Cardano. This event, in
partnership with Project NEWM, was an innovative
event showcasing blockchain technology linked to
video-streaming, NFT Ticketing and On-Chain Voting
as well as providing community artists the opportunity
to put their hard-work on display.
Winners included SHARL in first place with 'Earf Boy,'
Rogue Tactics in second place, and a tie for third place
All Finalists at this inaugural event received prizes
for their work, and enter the Cardano history books as
the first wave of innovators for original
streaming content for musicians in our ecosystem.

Epoch Synopsis 500.7: The one where IAGON teased a partnership with with EQUINIX,
one of the world’s largest bare-metal providers.
This development could significantly enhance Iagon’s
ability to meet the growing demand for storage
and compute needs, while bringing substantial benefits
to the Cardano ecosystem. Equinix, a global leader in data
center services is currently valued at a $73.3 billion
market cap on the NASDAQ under ticker EQIX.
“It’s an enterprise-grade bare metal server company
who will be running Iagon storage nodes.”
This integration would not only enhance Iagon’s
capabilities but also drive Cardano further in becoming
a comprehensive and competitive blockchain ecosystem.

Epoch Synopsis 500.8: The one where TAPTOOLS officially announced the upcoming
release of TAPPY v2. The TAPPY NFT from TAPTOOLS has been
one of their keystone products for accessing the Cardano
analytics platform, where holders of TAPPY NFTs are
able to utilize premium chart-trading and wallet-analysis
features, and holders of 5 TAPPY NFTs have access to
these premium services for life. Holders of only 1
TAPPY, however, will see this access expire later
this summer, and many were left speculating what
the next step would be for TAPTOOLS premium services.
This announcement sparked heated debate as to
whether the company should release another NFT
collection, while others supported the news
arguing that their company has to have some
source of revenue in order to remain
in operation. TAPPY v2 is set to debut on Cardano
at the end of the month on August 30th.

Epoch Synopsis 500.9: The one where INTERSECT kicked off the Summer of Voltaire
with the first-ever Constitutional Consultation Workshop.
Hotsed in Berlin by NICO aka Nicolas Cerny, who is the
Governance Lead at the Cardano Foundation, this inaugural
workshop event is the first of over 50 happening
all around the world in anticipation of the Cardano
Constitutional Convention in Argentina later
this year. Workshops are designed to facilitate feedback
and participation from Cardano community members
at each workshop location, and these inputs will have
a direct influence on the final ratified version
of the Cardano Constitution. Workshop participants will
also vote to send a member from their event to Argentina
as a representative at the Cardano Constitutional
Convention happening at the end of the year.
Epochs End congratulates everyone who will be hosting
one of the many workshops around the world, and sends
thanks to each and every participant working to
help shape the future of decentralized
governance on Cardano.
